<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataLK extends data { const CODE = 'LK'; const PREFIX = 94; const REGION = 'Asia'; const PATTERNS = array( '(?:[1-7]\d|[89]1)\d{7}', ); const TYPES = array( '(?:[189]1|2[13-7]|3[1-8]|4[157]|5[12457]|6[35-7])[2-57]\d{6}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '7[0-25-8]\d{7}'=>array( 'mobile', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{3})'=>'$1 $2 $3', ); }
